thread.title: Fiona Apple Just Dropped a Donald Trump Protest Song, and It's Actually Fire
thread.title_full: Fiona Apple Just Dropped a Donald Trump Protest Song, and It's Actually Fire

author: Brittney Stephens
title: Fiona Apple Just Dropped a Donald Trump Protest Song, and It's Actually Fire
text:
Fiona Apple's "Tiny Hands" Donald Trump Song Fiona Apple Just Dropped a Donald Trump Protest Song, and It's Actually Fire January 18, 2017 by Brittney Stephens 89 Shares 
Fiona Apple gifted us with a Donald Trump diss track just before the holidays (lyrics included "Trump's nuts roasting on an open fire," just in case you forgot), and now she's back with another anti-Trump track right in time for his presidential inauguration on Friday — and more importantly, the Women's Marches that follow it. The song, "Tiny Hands," was recorded on Apple's iPhone and composed by Michael Whalen. With a danceable beat and chantable lyrics — "We don't want your tiny hands / Anywhere near our underpants" — we can see this being a huge hit at the protests this weekend. Thanks, Fiona! Related:
